title: Art Boutiki Feb 15 with Idiot Fish
excerpt: We're opening for Idiot Fish on Feb 15 at Art Boutiki in San Jose!
content: We're opening for Idiot Fish on Feb 15 at Art Boutiki in San Jose! Doors at 8:30pm. Get your tickets now.

title: Come to our private event on July 27
excerpt: Celebrate Bagpipe Appreciation Day with progressive jazz!
content: Join us for a private event celebrating Bagpipe Appreciation Day on July 27th with progressive jazz.

title: Musik Ink private event postponed due to Covid-19
excerpt: Unfortunately our event has been postponed due to illness.
content: Unfortunately our Musik Ink event has been postponed due to Covid-19. Stay tuned for a rescheduled date.

title: Come see us play at Musik Ink on June 1
content: Come see us play at Musik Ink on June 1! This is a private event with $10 general admission.

title: Live recording from Art Boutiki now on YouTube
excerpt: Check out our 46-minute live recording from Art Boutiki opening for Idiot Fish!
content: Our live recording from Art Boutiki on 02/24/2024 opening for Idiot Fish is now available on YouTube. 46 minutes of progressive jazz rock!

title: Art Boutiki gig announcement
excerpt: We're playing Art Boutiki on Feb 24!
content: We're playing Art Boutiki on Feb 24! Come check us out.
